title: Featured Projects
subtitle: A collection of my recent work showcasing my skills and expertise in web development

projects.title: Financial Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive financial dashboard for tracking investments, expenses, and financial goals. Built with React and TypeScript, featuring real-time data visualization and responsive design.

images.alt: Financial dashboard main interface showing investment portfolio
Financial dashboard main interface showing investment portfolio

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A modern e-commerce platform with inventory management, payment processing, and customer analytics. Features include product filtering, user authentication, and responsive shopping cart.

images.alt: E-commerce platform homepage with featured products

projects.title: Fitness Tracking App
projects.description: A cross-platform fitness tracking application built with Flutter. Users can track workouts, set goals, view progress, and receive personalized recommendations based on their activity history.

images.alt: Fitness tracker dashboard showing activity statistics
Progress tracking with charts and achievements

projects.title: Hotel Booking System
projects.description: A comprehensive hotel booking system with integrated payment processing, room availability management, and customer review features. The platform includes an admin dashboard for hotel management.

images.alt: Hotel search interface with filters and map view
Room details page with booking options

projects.title: Project Management Tool
projects.description: A collaborative project management tool designed to streamline workflow and increase team productivity. Features include task assignment, progress tracking, resource management, and automated reporting.

images.alt: Project management dashboard with task overview
